Detailed Description

A checkbox is a specific type of two-states button that can be either checked or unchecked.

When the checkbox is pressed or clicked, the state changes automatically.

The following example demonstrates how to use the CheckBox

 gaia::ui::CheckBox* mpCheckBox = new gaia::ui::CheckBox(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 // set state of this button is checked
 mpCheckBox->setChecked(true);
